import React, {Component} from 'react' import ToyslandService from '../../services/ToyslandService' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Comics from '../../assets/images/home/comics.jpg' import Consolas from '../../assets/images/home/consolas.jpg' import Disfraces from '../../assets/images/home/disfraces.jpg' import Patinete from '../../assets/images/home/patinete.jpg' import Ps from '../../assets/images/home/ps.jpg' import Rollers from '../../assets/images/home/rollers.jpg' class Slider extends Component { state = { categories: [] } componentDidMount() { ToyslandService.categories() .then(categories => { this.setState({categories}, () => console.log(this.state.categories.category)) }) } render() { return(
Consolas
Comics
Disfraces
Patinete
Disfraces
Patines
) } } export default Slider
